# Sign up for our newsletter! Stay informed on the latest DevOps news

Five Great DevOps Job Opportunities

DevOps.com is now providing a weekly DevOps jobs report through which opportunities for DevOps professionals will be highlighted as part of an effort to better serve our audience.

Our goal in these challenging economic times is to make it just that much easier for DevOps professionals to advance their careers.

Of course, the [pool of available DevOps talent](https://devops.com/the-whats-and-hows-of-devops-talent-retention/) is still relatively constrained, so when one DevOps professional takes on a new role, it tends to create opportunities for others.

The five job postings shared this week are selected based on the company looking to hire, the vertical industry segment and naturally, the pay scale being offered.

We’re also committed to providing additional insights into the state of the DevOps job market. In the meantime, for your consideration.

**SimplyHired.com**

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://securityboulevard.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Techstrong-Gang-Youtube-PodcastV2-770.png)](https://youtu.be/Fojn5NFwaw8)

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://devops.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/770X330-DevOps-AppDev-Mar2025D.jpg)](https://info.futurumgroup.com/devops_appdev?utm_source=referral&utm_medium=in-article&utm_campaign=DevOps-Application-Report)

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://devops.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/770X330-DevOps-AppDev-Mar2025-2D.jpg)](https://info.futurumgroup.com/devops_appdev?utm_source=referral&utm_medium=in-article&utm_campaign=DevOps-Application-Report)

Zaden Technologies Huntsville, AL [Principal/Distinguished DevOps Lead](https://www.simplyhired.com/search?q=DevOps&jt=CF3CP&t=7&job=5ASyPgf7Gi4PgsFnXBQxWBFw4ejeHM4IdRyy0Ea3b2_-WUd0a7ZfpQ) $143,202 to $180,581

**Dice.com**

Adobe Lehi, UT [DevOps Security Engineer](https://www.dice.com/job-detail/b2eb2dba-61a7-4537-a050-3ecebf27d4ca) $133,900 to $242,000

**The Job Network**

Hazel Health San Francisco [DevOps Engineer](https://www.thejobnetwork.com/jobs/full-time?search=DevOps&jobId=2147483647) $130,000 to $160,000

**Indeed.com**

Zoom Remote [Cloud DevOps Engineer](https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=DevOps&l=&fromage=7&sc=0kf%3Aattr%28CF3CP%29%3B&from=searchOnDesktopSerp&vjk=eb04d8701278e9b8) $98,900 to $228,700

**LinkedIn**

Costco IT Schaumburg, IL [DevOps Engineer](https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search-results/?currentJobId=4331381021&eBP=NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_CHARGING&f_TPR=r604800&keywords=DevOps&origin=JOBS_HOME_SEARCH_BUTTON&refId=%2BLS79e5ANElVeb9SZARLww%3D%3D&trackingId=AOX6bis%2B4BsN4nyrAxk5Ww%3D%3D) $85,000 to $225,000
